title: ProjectRole represents a role that has access to a project

description.title: Description is a description of the role

groups.title: Groups are a list of OIDC group claims bound to this role

jwtTokens.title: JWTTokens are a list of generated JWT tokens bound to this role

items.title: JWTToken holds the issuedAt and expiresAt values of a token

name.title: Name is a name for this role

policies.title: Policies Stores a list of casbin formatted strings that define access policies for the role in the project
